comments.body: If you think the type definitions for version 3 will need to be updated in the future, please follow the guide [here](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#i-want-to-update-a-package-to-a-new-major-version). Otherwise, I will go ahead and merge this.
I don't think the version 3 definitions will need any updates. Hence I would be glad if you could merge. Thanks!
This will have the effect that you will get notified on every issue and PR related to react-map-gl types. Just something to be aware of.
